channel.title: Port problems
channel.description: I used uturrent as part of my portfowarding for my server. And my server is online when i change the connection port to 43594 but it wont let me log in. When i change it from 4354 to 8080 it lets me on but the server goes offline.

item.title: Port problems
item.dc:creator: @scoobygod scoobygod
item.description:
@scoobygod wrote:

thanks ima save this but i fixed it. I was forwarding the port 8080 from my internet modem i didnt realize it but i changed to 43594 and its fixed thanks though XD

Read full topic

item.title: Port problems
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

hmmmm useing utorrent when u are useing your ports that kinda fucks things upâ€¦

well use your router to run on ports 43594-43595

and then run your server and client on them ports. and close utorrent

when utorrent is up and same with your server the ports collide into 1 and other and they you get a server crash hence why you cant log on.

so close off your utorrent and use the ports from your router to 43594 or 43595 or 5555

Read full topic
